description:
Outline application for new block comprising three large shops and six by 2 bed and nine by 1 bed flats on upper levels.  Conversion of ground floor of existing block to offices and first floor into three 2 bed; one 1 bed and one studio flats.  Extension of mansard roof to three 2 bed and one 3 bed flats. 

 Applicants Plan Nos:  Site Plan,101-103,102R,6,A4,Photos.
decision_conditions: REASON: The proposed development fails to exploit the full potential of the site, prejudices development of the neighbouring site, fails to provide a through route to Newington Barrow Way and is considered premature contrary to the Hornsey Road Baths planning brief and is contrary to policies Imp4A and Imp5 of the Revised Unitary Development Plan 2000.
